sourcesContent:
/**
 * @since 0.4.5
 */
import * as t from 'io-ts';
/**
 * A codec that succeeds if a string is not empty
 *
 * @example
 * import { NonEmptyString } from 'io-ts-types/es6/NonEmptyString'
 * import { right } from 'fp-ts/es6/Either'
 * import { PathReporter } from 'io-ts/es6/PathReporter'
 *
 * assert.deepStrictEqual(NonEmptyString.decode('a'), right('a'))
 * assert.deepStrictEqual(PathReporter.report(NonEmptyString.decode('')), ['Invalid value "" supplied to : NonEmptyString'])
 *
 * @since 0.4.5
 */
export var NonEmptyString = t.brand(t.string, function (s) { return s.length > 0; }, 'NonEmptyString');
